name: Project Harmony (Double Flip Games, Furkan Küpçü, Burak Parlak)
name_original: Project Harmony (Double Flip Games, Furkan Küpçü, Burak Parlak)
description:
Project Harmony is a card game where player choice matters.
You as the player are now the leader of your country. With the choices you make try to keep a well sustainable system running and make sure you prepare a better future for generations to come.

Note: press F11 to enter/exit fullscreen
* This prototype is still in development *

Made by:
Artist Burak Parlak & Unity Developer Muhammet Furkan Küpçü
As a part of TechCamp 2022 Istanbul "Build games for a better future"
